title: Google Play Pass is finally available in India, offers select apps and games without ads or in-app purchases
content:
Google Play Pass is a subscription service that offers Android users apps and games without ads or in-app purchases for a fixed monthly/yearly fee. Initially limited to the US market, the service is now available in 90 countries, including Germany, Australia, Canada, and Europe. And now Google is expanding it to one more market: India.

The post Google Play Pass is finally available in India, offers select apps and games without ads or in-app purchases appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google's Play Pass subscription service is now available in India. Google is offering a free one-month trial of Play Pass. Read on.
